column5: Natural beauty and great art make this clean, comfortable house and attached apartment special. New appliances and fixtures, wood + tile floors, and fresh-bright colors make it cheery and relaxing. Two great kitchens, brand new quality beds, a sunny patio, enclosed backyard with trees, covered parking,  laundry room. Pack-and-play for small guests. Central to our diverse Military City USA, yet a short walk to 1,000-acre park. Airport 10 min., Downtown 20, Lackland 25 min. Kids and Pets Welcome.
column8: Colorful Garden Home plus Private Studio Apartment
